content.detailedDescription: Sparks ofin towardf green ball falling
content.summary: Sparks off creen spe.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:30 pm on saturday, 9th may and i was getting ready to go to bed. so i was coming up to my room, which is in the attic. i have some sky light windows, and one of the blinds was open. i normally look out the window, and i literally looked up and there were at least 10 bright orange/white lights..Moving in the same direction (from west to east) coming over my house. i'd never seen anything like this and it really did quite frighten me. straight away i knew this was definitely not right or normal. i knew they were not aircraft (well at least not conventional aircraft). i just quickly  grabbed my camera phone in an attempt to prove to people what i was witnessing. i then opened my window and proceeded to record the lights. i could see more of them coming up from behind the trees in the distance, and all following the same path. i noticed other people walking on the street, who were also witnessing what i was seeing. i started to shout across the street to them and they were as confused and amazed as i was. the lights just kept coming from over the distance and i was pretty concerned as to when or if they were going to stop. as soon as some disappeared, more would re-appear and keep coming over in the same direction. it looked as if they were following one another. they were making no noise, i could hear no aircraft noise and they were moving at a constant speed, but not too fast. i live on a busy main road, and people in their cars were stopping and pulling over to get out and watch them too. about 4 cars stopped along with some other pedestrians and people from the pub across the street. we all witnessed them for about 10 minutes, and more just kept coming. as i saw them heading over the top of my house, i rushed to the back window, which looks out over the city centre. i saw some of the lights moving into each other and then they would just disappear slowly. this happened for at least 15 minutes. the sky was pretty clear, i could see the moon in the south and i could also see stars, but these were definitely not stars. a couple of minutes after all of them had gone, i saw an airplane of some sort flying over in a non conventional flight plan in the direction of the city centre. as i am aware of where the flight paths are for commercial airlines and this plane was pretty low, my thought is maybe it was military. i'm have never seen lights like these, but they did seem to be glowing exceptionally bright and i noticed they were kind of flashing in an orbital fashion. we are quite near the peak district, and i thought maybe it was military, but i don't understand why they would do such an exercise over such a big city, quite early at night when people are bound to see. i'm not sure if they were alien, but at first it certainly scared me, as this wasn't your average light in the sky.

on another note, i have witnessed similar bright white orange lights from my window in the attic that seemed to move across, hover, then just simply disappear. this was about a few months prior to the sighting i had on the 9th of may. another person i know has also witnessed strange glowing hovering lights in the same area.

it's all very strange.
content.summary: Around 50 bright orange/white lights hovering over whirlow, sheffield, united kingdom...Then they all just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back deck with my cousin looking at all the airline contrails and noticed an object like a half a blue marble with a blue skirt and below that was a very brilliant gold light on the left of the object pointed toward a plant that manufactures nickel metal. it was about the size of a dime when held at arms length. the object was setting perfectly still, i told my cousin about it but he could not see it because he was under a deck umbrella, i went into the house to get a camera which was just off where we were and when i got back on the deck (30 seconds)the object had disapeared. i am very convinced that there are other intellegnt alleans watching us.
content.summary: Noticed beautiful colored round object in northern sky  that took my breath.

content.detailedDescription:
shortly after midnight on may 10, 2009 i awoke to use the bathroom and as i was washing my hands i happened to look out the bathroom window which faces almost straight west. there were three orbs or spheres of white light moving/floating in a circular type counter clockwise motion above my neighbours house which is only about 20 feet from my home. they would then move upward and move around each other making an intricate design and then drop down and resume the circular motion again repeating this every few seconds (in a playful type manner). these spheres were not high up in the sky. i don't know for sure at what elevation they were but my bathroom window is probably about 30 feet off the ground and i had to look up slightly to watch this light show. 
initially i thought someone was playing with spotlights but there were no beams leading up to these orbs, they were just floating in this same pattern over and over. 
i watched for a few minutes then began to realize this may be something very unusual. i became quite apprehensive and worried that "they" might know i was watching them so i crawled back into bed my mind racing as to what i had just witnessed. i got back up four or five minutes later to see if they were still outside my window but they were gone. 
all day sunday i kept thinking about what i had seen, rehashing it in my mind. unfortunately i was so mesmerized by this encounter i did not even think to take any pictures.
content.summary: 3 small spheres rotating counter clockwise then rising up to form an intertwined design then resuming counter clockwise motion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation in the canary islands, lanzarote, town of puerto del carmen. at the time of the sighting i was relaxing back on a balcony, listening to music and looking up at the sky. i was wearing sunglasses.

there were a few puffy white clouds moving from the north-east to the south west. the first object simply drifted into my field of vision.

it was a white sphere, and looked about the size of a pea held out at arms length. it was bobbing about in the air, but i could see the passing clouds above it, so it was beneath the cloud base.

when i saw it first i immediately thought it was either a bird like a gull, but i didn't see any wings or flapping - the object retained its spherical appearance. then i thought it was either a child's balloon, or maybe a plastic bag, but then i noticed it was moving in a random fashion *against* the prevailing winds. the clouds above it (i would estimate at 6000 feet) were moving from the ne to the sw, but this object was moving in a generalne direction.

i called my partner who spotted it after a few seconds.

i was still trying to make out if it was in fact a weather balloon (i've seen those before, i know what they look like), when i noticed a 2nd, identical white spherical opject, moving a dead-straight line from the sw to the ne. this object had the identical appearance to the first, but it was moving like a satellite - like it was on rails. it too was beneath the clouds, and moving in the opposite direction to that which the clouds were blowing.

for a moment i wondered if i was possible seeing the iss or something like that, but i immediately dismissed that as the object wasn't reflecting light or giving off any light of its own, and besides it was beneath the clouds too.

i was excited, and torn between going inside to get my camera, or staying and watching. i regret that i decided to stay and watch.

the second, straight-moving object continued on its ne track and was soon obscured by the roof of the building, and i didn't see it again. in all, it was visible for about 15-20 seconds.

the first object continued on its slightly random, bobbing course, but definitely moving to the ne too. it bobbed and floated against the clouds, and eventually it too was gone over the roof of the building in the same direction as the 2nd object, and i didn't see it again either.

i talked to my partner about this sighting, and he also said that he was very puzzled by it; he too didn't think it was a bird, or a balloon. he really thought it was man-made, but he couldn't explain why there were no wings or blades or any feature at all on the objects - he agreed with me that they appeared perfectly spherical.

i estimate the clouds were at about 6000 feet, and the objects were beneath the clouds, perhaps at 5000 feet. from their apparent size, i would guess that on the ground they might be the size of a small car, no bigger.

the objects appeared completely featureless; no marks, no lights, no appendages of any kind that i could see. if i didn't know the were moving against the wind, i would immediately surmise they were white balloons, like weather ballons.

i know that there are different wind directions at different altitudes, but i'm sure these 2 objects were at the same altitude, and yet their movements were so different; one bobbing and floating, and the other absolutely dead-straight, steady speed.

although puerto del carmen is quite close to ariciefe international airport, and there was constant air-traffic througout our stay, i didn't see any other aircraft in the sky at the time of the sighting.

i ocaisionally do some backyard astronomy from my home in ireland, and i've seen satellites, i've seen weather balloons, and once before, in the early 1990s i watched what i thought was a satellite moving in a slow track over my house; abruptly stop; describe a neat circle anti-clockwise, then extremely rapidly shoot off in the opposite direction from which it came, clearing the horizon in about 20 seconds.
content.summary: 2 small white spheres travelling in the same direction, against prevailing winds.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just finished having dinner and went to this out door bar to enjoy the ocean air.  we had just found a table to sit at, and at exactly 11:29pm (may 11th, 2009i noticed a eraser sized, white/yellowish object moving in the sky.  my seat was facing west, my back against the beach. 

my friend brent and robert were also at the table...Robert didn't see the object, but brent did (he was facing in a general sw direction).  my first reaction, i looked at robert...Brent's reaction was the same....Then we looked at each other and saw the look on each others face.  then we looked around, and it was as if no one saw anything.

it was quite the experience....And we were just amazed that we saw it.  also, it was as if we were the only ones to see it.  and, to guess at how the object moved, i would have to use the coast line as a reference.  with this, it made a "less than symbol" zag and then changed direction again, and shot off in a general nw or wnw direction, and then was instantly gone.  

to answer another question...In terms of what we thought when we saw it, we were both very amazed.  in my own mind, i've never really seen any evidence first hand....So now that i've seen it, i'm sure its a technology that isn't of this world, and/or that hasn't yet been released. 

also in regards to my first reaction to this light was it's size and brightness.  it was very much larger than any stars, and very much brighter than anything, but the moon.  its speed amazed me very much.  its agility surpasses anything i could even imagine we (as a world community) has ever developed.

and lastly, 'how we lost the object' was after it changed direction (the last time)....It seemed to just to accelerate and fade away.  

unfortunately we have no pictures, it happened way too fast for us to react other than just seeing it.
content.summary: Ufo at the sea house oceanfront inn. on atlantic beach, jacksonville fl.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on hiway 81 after crossing bass lake road noticed a bright blinking red light to the west, also saw to the left and upper and lower of object there were blinking white lights. pulled over on hiway 81 got out of car and watched for about 2 minutes, now only seeing one object and it was round and had white rotating blinking lights all around it.  went home and got the camera and it was gone.  my wife driving, my son in the back seat and we all saw the same thing.
content.summary: Red blinking light - became a round object with blinking white lights all around it.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving along hwy. 215 going east.  we had just gotten on 215 at eastern ave. and were adjusting the the flow of traffic.  i glanced up and saw this brilliantly  lite ufo.  it was not the shape of anything you have on your page.  the diamond was the closest to it. i tried to get another better look at the unusual shape.  i zerod in on it for about 2 seconds and was just adjusting my eyes when it blinked out.  the ufo looked like it had a million lights in it, and the material it was made out of looked like crystal to me.
content.summary: A brilliantly lite not really diamond shaped but something like it.

content.detailedDescription: In a 33 min. time span i witnessed 2 seperate lights that appeared to look like stars and third that my wife got to witness.There were planes and jets flying around and were all very distinct execpt for these star like objects that seemed to be flying a greater speed than jets and planes.The first 2 objects came into sight at different times in different locations both traveling west to east.The 3rd object witnessed by my wife and i was traveling south to north, first coming into sight in the same vacinity as the first 2.
content.summary: Ufo stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my chair watching a tv show and i looked outside and seen a bright object go through the sky at 10:00 p.M. exact. my dad tried taking a picture of and could't capture we seen it in the lens. it was heading north east and suddenly went east and dissapeared.
content.summary: It had a brilliant bright light had no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were on our way to a doctors appointment. while driving north by north east on mitchell blvd, i looked out of my driverside window and saw an object that did not automatically fit the description of anything i had ever seen before. it was highly reflective and round. it was smaller than a blimp and moving pretty quickly. it was appoximately 2500 ft in elevation and moving to the south at approximately 400 mph. i started to point it out to my wife and it dissappeared instantly. i am unsure of the size of the object if i had to take a guess i would say it was the same size as a vw minibus. another side note; it made no sound and left no contrails. (there were several contrails still hanging in the air from normal air traffic.) 
         it made me feel curious at first and then when it dissappeared i felt a little dissappointed becuase i could not figure out what it was.
content.summary: Glanced out window of car, saw object ,tried to figure out what it was, it dissappeared!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with a co-driver east on i-40 into north carolina before the tunnels in the tennesee smokey mountains. i was taking still pictures with my digital canon powershot a630. i shot a picture i thought would be a nice landscape photo of a river pointing out the window with the window up. there are spots on the window, but they are in the upper right of the picture. there were no spots on the middle of the photo. i put the picture on the magnifying feature and noticed a white light around the object that is a blur. then i put it on the edit feature of my computer to adjust the bright and contrast features at fully magnified. it has a ring of light or energy around it and when the bright is turned up or down the inner shape shows itself to be a disk shape brighter than the sky. i don't know what this could be. there are no housing developements, or power lines. meybe you can use some technology on this digital image to determine what it might be.
this picture is not edited. i can send the card it is on if it draws your interest.
content.summary: I was taking pictures through the passenger window of the semi tractor.

content.detailedDescription: In may 2 2009 with my telescope in the backyard  around 10.15p.M.The north to the southwest i see very bright light around 1500 ft 2000ft focus the telescope i see one sphere with somenthing four corner points structure stacked one each other and the middle the structure one line with very bright line red color when pass over me no sound nothing no more details move fast and no easy focus with telescope very strange object. for my is no the first time strange object move over the sky in puerto rico.
content.summary: Sphere with something four corner points stacked one each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer and my sister called me out because she thought her mom was seeing something weird in the sky so i walked out poolside and there she was looking up and syaing something i said were is it she said"it gotta be a satellite cause it made an s shape and it moving so fast" and i look up and see a ball of bright white light and it look like a planet in the night sky but alot bigger and its started to curve to the north west (it was heading west) and i thought i should video tape this because no one will believe me so a i ran back in and got the camcorder a stood off my deck and video taped for about 4 seconds a big white ball of light i reviewed it this morning and theres no landing lights or and y structure to it theres just the ball of light i basically remebered everything i could it had to be a piloted craft because it changed direction and it didnt have a the comet tail so it wasnt stuff burning in the atmosphere and there was no apparent structure to it at all if you would like the video just email me and also it seemed rely high in the air like it was a satellite thats the only thing i havent rulled out but satellites dont change direction ass much as this thing did or make s shape patterns in the sky at least i dont think they do but i dont have the direction change in the video a just have it heading of into the distance and u cant rely see that
content.summary: A white ball of light made strange movements over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi my name is kevin and at 5:30am sunday may 10th, 2009 i was outside smoking a cigerette, when i looked up from the corner of my house and saw a bright white light traveling south-west from my property at big tumbling creek, outside of saltville va.  this very bright light did not flash, flicker, nor pulsate. it was a constant light. the really strange part is as soon as i started to really focus on it, it went dark!! it was as if, it realized i noticed it and shut it's light off!  i've been a avid skywatcher for some time now and i know what planes and etc look like and the types of flashing lights on different parts of the planes and helicopters. this was no conventional aircraft. it was lower to the ground than lets say a airliner, made no noise. whats really strange is around this time last year i witnessed something very similiar, last year i was fooling with a sensor light on the side of my house, pushing the sensor upwards with a broom stick because its high up at the eve of my roof and seen a solid white light, a sphere or globe, etc.It was halfway between a airliner flying height and the ground. it was huge!! if you put a nickel at arms length up to the sky,...That was the size of it!! just a solid white light, it was round or a sphere, i couldn't tell. it made no noise as well. it flew right over my head (which was when i noticed it) and it flew north-east. i watched it till it went over the mountain range which took i'd say 10 to 15 seconds but, it felt like forever seeing as how i was fascinated and shocked watching it!! both times i haven't had a camera ready. my camera doesn't take good pics at night sky wise but it would have taken a good pic etc of the time last year since it was so bright! it was almost like watching the moon flying by!!! no joke.  this report probably is all jumbled and out of order, lol sorry about it i'm just excited at the moment seeing it just happened a few minutes ago lol 

last year i had witnessed 2 other things a few days after the initial sighting. i tried to take a pic of it but it didn't take. one was something pretty big and was down in the valley floating towards the other mountain. there is no way a plane would be down at around 100 to 150 feet above my neighbors house. i live in a valley and the 2 mountains are wayyy to close for that. it was silent as well. it had numerous lights on it that didn't blink, they were yellow in color. then a week or so after that i road up the road from my house to a pop machine in a campground close by and as i turned around i noticed something orange in color right above my house! it was no more than 100 feet. it floated towards a hill close by my house and disapeared in the tree line. there was no noise as well. the peculiar thing with that one was a minute or so after it dissapeared in the tree line i saw some sort of aircraft come from that way, heading back the other way. when i seen it i heard it. but, it made no sense. that left me truly confused. it almost looked like a flare, which maybe it was, but i only say that because of the color and it sort of looked like a firey light. but how it went from one thing and then turned around behind a tree and was i'd say 50 feet higher and made noise i don't understand. that probably made no sense, i'm sorry but it's hard to explain at the moment
content.summary: Wierd lights in the night sky around my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the stars at night on my deck with my boyfriend, and saw this one bright object in the sky; yellow in color, and itwas moving about 1 1/2 inches in circumference of the object.  and it radiated a brightbeam oflight which was noted once i got out my binoculars.  and you couldsee the beam of light move when the object was movng.  we watched it for about 10 minutes.  probably isstil there, bu it is cold.  maybe its a satelliete, but i did not think that they move that much.  

i a incalifornia, county is san bernardino, i was not able to click that in the box that is there.
content.summary: Upon watching the stars, me and my boyfriend saw strange object that moved and appeared to be a very bright star but yellow in color.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 9 "o" clock may 9th 2009,i went onto my back patio to smoke a cigarette,(from where i live i have a clear view of the city lights of phoenix).What actually drew me to the object is because i had seen it in roughly the same part of the sky the previous night,
on that night,(may 8th)i watched it hover and pulse vibrantly on the horizon for about an hour or two. in that time frame i saw 20+ planes(mostly non comercial or helicopters)  fly past it, near it, or circle it,
i watched it for what seemed like ages and it progressively got dimmer as if it was flying away tremendously slow and eventually dissapeared...Thats how my may 8th sighting ended...,also i want to include a strange phenomenon i experience...When i tried to take a picture of it,first i was struck with its appearence what to me looked like one ball of light pulsing green and blue and red appeared in my cameras viewfinder as a string of 5-6 seperate lights that would flicker on and off dimming out and back on in seperate seemingly undetermined intervals with very little color (occasional pulsations of vibrant blues greens and red)i could not photograph this object,i took pictures of my house and the sky elsewhere to verify my camera was working and still could not get a picture of it.But anyways,today i was watching the same light as it hovered there barely moving just like before,pulsing vibrantly just like before, but this time i ran and grabbed my binoculars,
when i looked at it in focus it looked like a saucer or slightly cone like object, with a red light floating above a florecent,
blue-green ring of light.I watched it for about 45minutes and then it dissapeared in a quick burst of light...{hard to describe it was like nothing i have ever seen}i went inside and after 2minutes of siting felt compelled to continue wathching the sky. i decided to climb through my window and stand on a flat section of roof for a better view,and not 1minute after i got out there i saw an orange ball of light come shooting accross the horizon, (by far the fastests thing i have ever witnessed in motion) as i watched in awe it screamed across the sky from out by red mountain to south mountain in less than 1 seccond flat , as it neared the center of my view of the city (near the airport i believe) i saw another light come shooting out of the sky at an even faster speed it is so hard...To find words to do it justice but it appeared out of nowhere, higher in the sky than i have ever seen a plane and in a split seccond and with a streak of  light it shot down to where the other orange light had just abbrupltey stopped and started hovering,the two lights hovered there for about 2 minutes before they started dimming out slowly like they where getting farther away.After about 5minutes of them dimming i could not get a glimpse of the objects at all and came inside to look for a phone number or place i could report my sightings. ive been a very avid persuer of answers in regards to ufos and the phoenix lights. i would very much appreciate it if you could contact me back at my email or cell phone with information on how to get involved in the tracking in study of ufo's i hope my information is of use to you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Cone,  Circle,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: I watched a light pulsing with vibrant colors hover over the city then disappear in a flash of light...

content.detailedDescription:
I just read a post on mufon labeled "2009-01-26  	2009-01-25  	hovering, star with blinking lights" and i wanted to say - yes - i have seen this same object and so has my fiance. we live in hatfield, pa. one night we observed it for at least a half hour or more. it was not there the next night so it's not a star. it barely moves so it's not a plane. it looks like a bright star but when looked at closely, it looks like it has multi-colored lights flickering as if you are watching a glowing crystal.
the exact date and time - i do not remember
content.summary: Star-like object with multi-colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a group of bright pin point lights approximately 7,000 ft.- 10,000 ft. moving from north to south in sky. they appeared to be disk in shape and moved in an unorganized formation. i photographed the objects on my rear apartment balcony until they passed. i then ran through my apartment to my front door and continued to photograph them from my front balcony.   the objects stopped suddenly and floated in the sky. then they went separately in various directions. one or two went straight up till out of sight. one went south west, two went east a couple others kinda went into the clouds. i called another person and they saw two lights in the sky also. the light were so very bright that i feel they burned into my eyes. it was a bright and blue sky with small puffy/fluffy clouds. strange movement for balloons.

1. i was on my computer reading email and looking at youtube videos.

2. not sure why i got up from the computer and looked out on my balcony. at first glance, i looked right at them above the trees, as if i knew they would be there.

3. i kinda thought they were helicopters but i was perplexed at the formation and the faintness of glow. 

4. the objects floated and stopped and moved freely in various directions. the objects seemed to vibrate.

5. i felt unusually nervous taking the pictures. i am a digital photographer. 

6. the objects dispersed into different directions and faded out of sight.
content.summary: 8 or 9  grouped lights traveling north to south.

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to my patio to smoke a cigarette at around 10:30 the evening of april 19th. as i exhaled the first time i gazed to the west sky and saw this fireball like object pulsating in the sky. i began starring at it trying to figure out what exactly it could be. as i stood there gazing at it looked like it was coming closer to my location. the object seemed to move around and be coming closer to me. the pulsating of the object became very hypnotizing and really drew my attention. after about three or four minutes or so it seemed to faded off, i then went back into my apartment to tell some company i had been entertaining what i had just saw, they just brushed me off and said i have had to much chardonnay. i really wish i had grabbed my camera as it was back in my apartment with my guests who were using it at the time. thank you for your time.    [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: The object had a fireball like shape and it was glowing and pulsating.

content.detailedDescription:
on saturday may 9th 2009 at 1630 my wife an i were at a park in downtown tucson arizona.  it was a bright sunny day with no clouds.  we laid down to enjoy the day and we both spotted plane flying over head.  it was a normal passenger plane.  we are near an air force base and an international airport.  my wife and i are under a pine tree.  the plane disappears into the braches, and then we spot a very small yet super shinny object up in the sky.  it seemed to be higher than the plane and further away.  the plane crossed between us and the object in our field of view. the object was stationary. i thought it was an astronomical event, maybe venus shinning very brightly for some odd reason.  so we did not try and find the plane after it flew over the tree we were under.  but neither of us ever saw it again.  

	the ufo stayed in its position for approximately 15 minutes.  after a while we both had taken our eyes off of it, only too look back to its location and not see it there. instead it was heading northeast at a decent pace, blinking like a light.  its speed was maybe a little faster than a cruising passenger plane.  however we could not judge its altitude well.  it flew too far away and out of sight for us.  we did not have a video or picture abilities with us.  my wife and i were surprised and proceeded to try and interpret what we had saw.

	then after we were digesting what we had saw, we looked back up and she spotted two more objects that were the exact same luminosity and size.  they were floating very slowly in the same direction as the previous one.  they floated away over a period of ten minutes and out of view, however they never blinked or sped up.  my wife and i did not spot anything else that day.
content.summary: Three shiny objects over tucson, az.

content.detailedDescription:
This account summary is being entered by ga asst state director ralph o. howard, jr. because the sighting was reported directly to me (howard) via a temporary 1-800 line installed as part of the investigation of a sighting associated with another nearby case.  the narrative is based direectly on and is close to, the audio recording from the 800 line.  

-----------------------------------------------

i was driving home from my girlfriends, coming north on ptree industrial boulevard.  time about 3:15 am.  i took the exit for ptree corners circle and as i go onto that road headed north, i saw a brightly-lit something straight ahead, at a distance, above the trees.  i thought it was a fire truck or rescue truck, im thinking what the heck is that?  i kept an eye on it as i kept going, it was getting brighter as if maybe i was getting closer.  

it was huge, the size of a subdivision, with very bright red & white lights all over it.  i couldnt see a shape, it was dark and the lights just too bright.  finally, not believing this at all, i just brought the car to a complete stop.  this was just before the intersection of corners, with holcomb bridge rd.  

i got my head out of the driver side window and got a good look at it.  i just could not believe the size and brightness.  it began or had just begun, to move, headed se like towards doraville.  i turned right to get over to my house to get a camera but when i came back to that spot, it was gone.
content.summary: Huge, very bright red & white-lit object over road close to my home, norcross, ga.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 8th 2009, myself and a friend whitnessed the sighting of 4 objects neither of us could explain.

3 orange objects appeared from the sky traveling at varying speeds at a fairly high height. the objects were spherical/triangular shape and all moved in the same direction. there was also no sound from the objects. this lasted about 10 minutes until all 3 had disappeared. my friend had tried to video it, however it failed to record.

roughly 5 minutes later after debating about what it could possibly be with no obvious answers; another orange light came from the same direction out of nowhere, again at a different speed to those previously. my friend tried to record it, however the video camera froze for the first ever time. within about 5 minutes the object had disappeared in the same direction of the 3 previously. 

after spending much time debating what it could have been, i still cannot find any logical explanation for it.
content.summary: 4 orange lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling toward hwy. 98 on blue angel hwy. and i saw something that looked like it was going to collide with a plane.  i became very anxious at this sight and tried to figure out what it was.  at first i thought it was two planes, then i realized the other object was too small.  after that, i thought it was a bird, but quickly realized that this object was not shaped like a bird and didn't have the movements of a bird.  as i drove closer to the intersection i could see that this thing was round and looked like it was maneuvering around the plane.  my five year old commented that it looked like someone kicked a ball up there and it couldn't come down.  i even thought maybe it was a balloon.  one of the mylar balloons that's shiny metallic.  there's a small airport called ferguson's airport further down hwy. 98 and the plane turned and took off in that direction.  the object stayed straight and just went the opposite direction in a very fluid movement across hwy. 98 and hovered the trees once it was a little distance across the hwy.  i was completely amazed at what i was seeing and unable to figure out what this object was, so  i pulled into the gas station on the corner of the two highways and stared at the object hovering above the trees.  it was shiny and seem to be blinking or something while it was there.  i have no idea how long i sat there staring because i was afraid that if i turned my head i might lose it and might never know what it was.  all of the sudden i was staring at the object and then somehow it was gone!  i have three children and the only one who saw this thing was my five year old who sits in the middle of the back seat with the best visibility.
content.summary: Small round metallic object flew around plane and then hovered above trees.

content.detailedDescription:
Object was black- showed up big-was not far away. i was on park road coming from downtown direction. when got in left turn lane to go to south park saw object in sky behind new condo building over trees(slightly to my left) or least it appeared to be over the trees. was not very far above the trees. it did not move. i glanced away and looked back and it was com;pletely gone. i thought it was odd that a flying maching that was so big and hovering in a way that appeared not to be even moving could get away so fast.   i continued on to phillipos place on fairview road. 
when i turned into phillips place at the dean and deluca entrance there it was again slightly to my left over the trees behing more condos. it did not move and this time i glanced away and same thing happenened. when looked back it was gone. i ckd along park road later to see how far back the trees go. the next road back is sharon view but i think it was over the trees behing the big condo before get to sharon view and in that area are some pylons with an opening for the pylons cut through the trees. when i saw it the first time i thought was a balloon of some sort tho i had never seen a balloon like it and the form was completely different from any balloon i had ever seen.    if someone wants to contact me it will be ok. i used to go to mufon meetings. or also if anyone has seen anything similar i would like to hear about it. thanks [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Looked like rounded egg with small rectangle on back.

content.detailedDescription: It was the same type starlike craft that i saw at smith resevour on july 19 2008. once again my girlfriend just got home she works nights and i went out on the balcony to look at the moon one last time before it went down and it came from the west. i immediatly called my girlfriend out and we watched it for about 2 and a half minutes then i ran in put my shoes on and chased it on foot for about 3 minutes. as soon as i ran home i jumped on the computer and checked for satilite locations and the closest one was over mexico around mexico city  so i know it wasnt a satilite. im very excited and wont be going back to bed this morning.
content.summary: It came from the west at about an altitude of around 4000 to 5000 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
We're trying to get video but it's quite a distance.  breaking out the telescope now.  was hoping to find locals on line to help me confirm or at least identify the object.  no such luck.

my home faces due east.  the object was to the east in the sky, it was quite a distance but bright.  there is a telephone pole about 1/4 block east and object seemed to be about 1/2 - 3/4 hight of tele pole.  don't know how to calculate height unless i had a distance so probably no help.

i'm going back out to look again.  it's been there a while  now.  moving what seems to be (visually 2" or more in each direction, based on distance, it'd be moving a lot up, down and to both  sides) with no pattern and very quickly.  does not appear to be a plane.  it wouldn't be moving like that if it were.
content.summary: Light in distant eastern sky moving around a great deal with no pattern

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday morning  4/5/09, at exactly 4:30 am, my family (son ryan, wife kathie, mother leota) were returning from soaring eagle casino.  we were heading south on us127 and were somewhere between mt. pleasant and shepard (where the speed limit is still 70mph) i was driving, when my son ryan pointed and asked what that is?  i could not see it at that time.  ryan said it was a red light, then he said it zipped across the road and then back again at a very high rate of speed. ryan said it did this 2 times.  i finally saw the red light at 11:00.
it seemed to be growing brighter and slightly larger, but it was not blinking.  i would estimate, using the tree line that it was roughly 10-12 times higher in the sky.  kathie and leota who were in the back seat could not see the light at this point as the roof of the car was blocking thier view of the light.  at this point about 3 minutes had elapsed.  ryan and i then saw the red light all of a sudden it flashed to a brilliant large white light.  i have never seen anything so bright before. it was a peircing white light.  the white light was moving now on a course that took it directly across us127 and over my car while i was going 70mph.  as the light approach from 11 o'clock, we could make out 3 seperate lights in the shape of a triangle.  the 3 lights were very large and as it passed overhead, we could see through the windshield that not only were there 3 white lights in a triangle shape, but that there was also the outline of a trianglular shapped craft.  the 3 lights took up the majority of the craft's outline that was visible.  at this point the craft was only about 3 times the tree level over our car.  we also saw a small fin on the back, but no wings and there was no sound, as i had rolled my window down.  it was moving fast and crossed over the car and out over the field to our right, where it hovered.  it was at this point that my wife kathie and my mother leota saw the lights.  leota was sitting behind the driver's seat and could not see much, she is 90.  kathie had a better view from the backseat now, but could not tell what it was.  ryan my son is 24, kathie is 55 and i am 60 years old.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving steady red light glowed, then turned to larger brilliant white, passed over our car.  we saw a triangle with 3 white lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my mailbox at the end of my driveway when i noticed a triangular shaped metallic object in the sky above the cornfield. the craft was about 300 feet off the ground and about 100 yards from me as a distance. it seemed to just hang in the sky making no sound. 
there were multi colored lights
around the perimeter and seemed to blink in a controled fashion. the colores were red, blue, green and white. the sighting in its entirety
lasted aprox 2 minutes. when the craft left it slowly rose another 200 feet and then just took off at an amazing rate of speed.

when i went to the mailbox i was on the phone and wasnt paying attention
to what was going on infront of me. i remember looking at the ground the whole time i was walking. i only noticed it because i saw the beautiful
light display from the object from the corner of my eye. i dont remember
who i was on the phone with at the time i just rembering saying" oh my god!" the other person said something to the effect of "whats going on?"
and i just hung up the phone and stood in amazement. i am a tool and die maker by trade and can honestly say i have never saw something so incredibly beautiful in my life. the craft was a work of art. i just stood there in awe of the creative masterpiece that hung so silently in the sky. the lights seemed to be so clear and  vibrant.

i would estimate the craft to be the size of a football field. during the sighting i was almost frozen and just stood there even afraid to blink.
i knew that what i was seeing was not normal and i didnt want to miss any - thing. there is no way our government could create some thing this awsome in size and to have it so silent. i was not afraid in any way until
i went back into the house after the sighting. it was then that i realized
what i saw. i know.. what i saw that night was a u.F.O -

i did not make a report because i didnt think calling the police was the proper channel. it wasnt until the last year that i heard of mufon and since decided to make my report.
content.summary: Triangular, metallic object, in the sky, with multi colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in a parked car as st. francis hopital waiting on my wife. i was parked towards the northeast with all my windows and the sun roof open. the day was clear enough to see jet traffic at about 35,000 feet with a small cloud deck at about 2,000 feet. at the time stated above, i say a flash of light/reflection directly overhead. at that point i  noticed a round metalic shaped object sitting stationary below a cloud. at that point i used a motorola v557 cell phone vidio recorder and took about a 17 second vidio that showed the object then it accelerated into and behind the cloud. it excellerated behind the cloud so fast from a hovering position that it defied anything i know of as a conventional aircraft. 

i have logged 2,750 hours in air force aircraft as a crewman and this was not listed as anthing i know of.
content.summary: Saw reflection of object under a cloud about 2000 ft. up.
